item.description:
hi everyone,

taking the grandkids to see this today, sounds like a great movie.  Julia Roberts plays the evil queen (I think), in this "snow white" take off.  the previews sound good, even for big kids ;) check out the movie at chunkys.com

we'll be in the lobby at 3pm.  Matinees are $5.25 I believe (4 and under is free).  Movie starts at 3:50pm, good to get there early and order eats, great food menu and full bar menu.

I still have some left over passes,  popcorn and ice cream sundae coupons for a discount.

movie is $5.25, popcorn is $4.25 and sundae is $4.99 (big enough for two)

I'll put a couple envelopes together and give all three for $10.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Mirror Mirror at Chunkys in Pelham
